content: Project management tools are used for planning, organizing, and managing resources, tasks, and schedules for a project. These tools help in ensuring that the project is completed within the given time and budget constraints. They can be used for monitoring progress, tracking changes, communicating with team members, and reporting to stakeholders. Project management tools also help in keeping all the project-related information organized and accessible in one place, thus making it easier to collaborate with team members and stakeholders.
